an10.212:4.1: “Someone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.212:4.3: It’s when a certain person kills living creatures. They’re violent, bloody-handed, a hardened killer, merciless to living beings.
an10.212:5.12: Someone with these ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.212:6.1: Someone with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
an10.212:6.3: It’s when a certain person gives up killing living creatures. They renounce violence and harming. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all creatures.
an10.212:7.12: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
